item.title: Alternative preludes for Haskell
item.description: Glossary Lazy IO haskell Foundation Provide a better and more efficient prelude than base’s prelude. https://hackage.haskell.org/package/foundation be self-sufficient: no external dependencies apart from base. provide better data-types: packed unicode string by default, arrays. Better numerical classes that better represent mathematical thing (No more all-in-one Num). Better I/O system with less Lazy IO Usual partial functions distinguished through type system Lazy IO https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5892653/whats-so-bad-about-lazy-i-o Lazy IO has the problem that releasing whatever resource you have acquired is somewhat unpredictable, as it depends on how your program consumes the data – its “demand pattern”.

item.title: (WIP) How to play Dwarf Fortress (in fortress mode)
item.description: https://df-walkthrough.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ Navigating left hand should sit on keys 1 to 4. right hand should sit on keys 6 to 9. pinkies navigate bottom left to top right. index fingers navigate top left to bottom right Reviews Post your emacs(Screenshot) here. : emacs It's cool that you want to learn Dwarf Fortress, just be aware that it's very buggy. The hardcore fans also greatly exaggerate how interesting and complex it is.
